name.ja: <ruby>武<rt>ぶ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>賢<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby>－アーカス

text.en:
(This card is always treated as a "Sky Striker" card.)
You can discard 1 Spell; Special Summon this card from your hand. If a Link Monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish 1 Spell from your GY instead. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can target 1 of your banished "Sky Striker" Spells; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "War Magus - Aakas" once per turn.
